name: Hellslinger [WIP]
description:
Blast your way through the hordes of Hell as you strive to reclaim your soul in this narrative driven FPS. You are Hellslinger, a master of the gun. Shouldn't be too hard right? All you've got to do is slay the Lord of Hell and stop his invasion of the mortal realm.

Play as the Hellslinger in her battle out of Hell.

In life she was a reckless outlaw, and a gunfighter thought to be unmatched, until a dark turn of fate found her in a hollow grave... and trapped in the Infernal Realm. After centuries of suffering and torture, a small splinter of hope finally revealed itself to her from the most unlikely source. But it is a hope that must be fought for. Dual 6 shooters in hand, Hellslinger has the hordes of hell between her and redepmtion, a bloody path carved from the barrel of a gun awaits.

Time is running short, and Hellslinger's journey has just begun…

Hellslinger boasts classically styled FPS gameplay that will feel like home to fans of the genre. From blistering run and gun encounters to epic set piece driven arenas, Hellslinger is replete with tried and tested FPS design that has been perfected over more than 3 decades. Layered on top of this are a host of unique elements that add a whole new dimension to the experience that is Hellslinger.

Features

  • Fast and Fierce Combat: Powerful weapons, regenerating grenades and special abilities form the backbone of your toolkit, but quick movement and reaction are just as vital. Use everything at your disposal - from melee kills to replenish health, to grenade kills for generating extra ammunition - and never underestimate your enemy.

  • A Focus on Replayability: 4 player classes* to choose from, with each character wielding their own distinct weapons, abilities and playstyles. (*The demo will feature 2 of the 4 classes, Hellslinger and Veronika).

  • A Narrative Driven Campaign: Journey through the Infernal Realm and discover twisted worlds that mirror History's darkest times, as Hellslinger fights to stop Abaddon from turning Earth into the Hell that she has known for far too long.

  • Unlockable Sigils - Unlock an array of powerful abilities, passive buffs, and gameplay changes by discovering new Sigils throughout the campaign, to help turn the tide of war in your favor, or to simply spice things up a bit! (*This feature will not be ready for the demo).

  • A Brave New Hell: Explore an incredible vision of the underworld, with completely hand drawn animations, sprites, effects and textures combining both traditional and digital art, bringing a truly unique aesthetic to Hellslinger.
